template.name: General Ranking View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    LatinChain General Ranking (verified and not verified)
                
                
                    

                        Current time:  UTC


                        
                            Your points:  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                            

                            
Latin points: 
                            

                            
                              
                                

                                  Chess
                                  Snake
                                  Sudoku
                                
                              
                              
                                

                                  
                                  
                                  
                                
                              
                            


                        
                        
                            Total users in the app: 

                        
                        
                            Total verified users in the app: 


                        
                        
                        
                            $(document).ready(function($) {
                                $(".on-page-search").on("input.highlight", function() {
                                    var searchTerm = $(this).val();
                                    $(".accordion-body").unmark().mark(searchTerm);
                                    if(searchTerm.trim() != "")
                                    {
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).hide();
                                        if($( ".accordion-body" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                        {
                                           $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                           $(".list-group-item").each(function(index) {
                                                if($(this).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                {
                                                    $(this).show();
                                                }
                                            });
                                            
                                           $( "#text_found" ).show();
                                           $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                           if($( ".username_code" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                           {
                                                $( "#user_found" ).show();
                                           }
                                           else
                                           {
                                                $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                           }
                                            
                                           $( "#headingOne" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }else
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                            $( "#text_notfound" ).show();
                                            $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }
                                    }else
                                    {
                                        $('.list-group-item').show();
                                        
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).show();
                                        $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                        $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                        $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                        
                                        $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                    }
                                }).trigger("input.highlight").focus();
                                
                                $("#user_question").click(function() {
                                    $(".on-page-search").focus();
                                });
                                
                                $( ".clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                    var result = confirm($("#clear_cache_message").text());
                                    if(result)
                                    {
                                        try {
                                            Cache.delete();
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                        try {
                                            window.location.reload(true);
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                            });
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.
                        
                        


                        
                        

                            

                            

                                 
                            
                            

                                
                                
                            
                            

                        
                        

                        

                          

                            

                              
                                Global ranking () ‚óè
                              
                            
                            

                              

                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                        
                                        
                                        
                                        
.  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                                        

                                        
Latin points: 
                                        

                                        
                                          
                                            

                                              Chess
                                              Snake
                                              Sudoku

template.name: Points View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    LatinChain Leaders Board
                
                
                    

                        Current time:  UTC


                        
                            Your points:  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                            

                            
Latin points: 
                            

                            
                              
                                

                                  Chess
                                  Snake
                                  Sudoku
                                
                              
                              
                                

                                  
                                  
                                  
                                
                              
                            


                        
                        
                            Total users in the app: 

                        
                        
                            Total verified users in the app: 


                        
                        
                        
                            $(document).ready(function($) {
                                $(".on-page-search").on("input.highlight", function() {
                                    var searchTerm = $(this).val();
                                    $(".accordion-body").unmark().mark(searchTerm);
                                    if(searchTerm.trim() != "")
                                    {
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).hide();
                                        if($( ".accordion-body" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                        {
                                           $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                           $(".list-group-item").each(function(index) {
                                                if($(this).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                {
                                                    $(this).show();
                                                }
                                            });
                                            
                                           $( "#text_found" ).show();
                                           $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                           if($( ".username_code" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                           {
                                                $( "#user_found" ).show();
                                           }
                                           else
                                           {
                                                $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                           }
                                            
                                           $( "#headingOne" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }else
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                            $( "#text_notfound" ).show();
                                            $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }
                                    }else
                                    {
                                        $('.list-group-item').show();
                                        
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).show();
                                        $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                        $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                        $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                        
                                        $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                    }
                                }).trigger("input.highlight").focus();
                                
                                $("#user_question").click(function() {
                                    $(".on-page-search").focus();
                                });
                                
                                $( ".clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                    var result = confirm($("#clear_cache_message").text());
                                    if(result)
                                    {
                                        try {
                                            Cache.delete();
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                        try {
                                            window.location.reload(true);
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                            });
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.
                        
                        


                        
                        

                            

                            

                                 
                            
                            

                                
                                
                            
                            

                        
                        

                        

                          

                            

                              
                                Leaders zone () ‚óè
                              
                            
                            

                              

                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                            
                                        
                                        
                                            
                                        
                                        
                                        
.  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                                        

                                        
Latin points: 
                                        

                                        
                                          
                                            

                                              Chess
                                              Snake
                                              Sudoku

template.name: Top 10 View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    LatinChain Top 10 Board
                
                
                    

                        Current time:  UTC


                        
                            Your points:  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                            

                            
Latin points: 
                            

                            
                              
                                

                                  Chess
                                  Snake
                                  Sudoku
                                
                              
                              
                                

                                  
                                  
                                  
                                
                              
                            


                        
                        
                            Total users in the app: 

                        
                        
                            Total verified users in the app: 


                        
                        
                        
                            $(document).ready(function($) {
                                $(".on-page-search").on("input.highlight", function() {
                                    var searchTerm = $(this).val();
                                    $(".accordion-body").unmark().mark(searchTerm);
                                    if(searchTerm.trim() != "")
                                    {
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).hide();
                                        if($( ".accordion-body" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                           $(".list-group-item").each(function(index) {
                                                if($(this).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                {
                                                    $(this).show();
                                                }
                                            });
                                            
                                           $( "#text_found" ).show();
                                           $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                           if($( ".username_code" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                $( "#user_found" ).show();
                                           else
                                                $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                           
                                           if($( ".accordion-zone" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingOne" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }else
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }
                                           if($( ".accordion-chess" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingTwo" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }else
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingTwo" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }
                                           if($( ".accordion-snake" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingThree" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }else
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingThree" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }
                                           if($( ".accordion-sudoku" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingFour" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }else
                                           {
                                                $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingFour" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                           }
                                        }else
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                            $( "#text_notfound" ).show();
                                            $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                            $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingTwo" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                            $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingThree" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                            $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingFour" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }
                                    }else
                                    {
                                        $('.list-group-item').show();
                                        
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).show();
                                        $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                        $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                        $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                        
                                        $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingTwo" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingThree" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        $( "#panelsStayOpen-headingFour" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                    }
                                }).trigger("input.highlight").focus();
                                
                                $("#user_question").click(function() {
                                    $(".on-page-search").focus();
                                });
                                
                                $( ".clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                    var result = confirm($("#clear_cache_message").text());
                                    if(result)
                                    {
                                        try {
                                            Cache.delete();
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                        try {
                                            window.location.reload(true);
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                            });
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.
                        
                        


                        
                        

                            

                            

                                 
                            
                            

                                
                                
                            
                            

                        
                        

                        

                          

                            

                              
                                Top 10 zone () ‚óè

                              
                            
                            

                              

                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                            
                                        
                                        
                                            
                                        
                                        
                                        
.  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                                        

                                        
Latin points: 
                                        

                                        
                                          
                                            

                                              Chess
                                              Snake
                                              Sudoku
                                            
                                          
                                          
                                            

                                              
                                              
                                              
                                            
                                          
                                        
                                        
                                    
                                
                              
                            
                          
                          

                            

                              
                                Top 10 zone Chess () ‚óè
                              
                            
                            

                              

                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                            
                                        
                                        
                                            
                                        
                                        
                                        
.  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                                        

                                        
Latin points: 
                                        

                                        
                                          
                                            

                                              Chess
                                              Snake
                                              Sudoku
                                            
                                          
                                          
                                            

                                              
                                              
                                              
                                            
                                          
                                        
                                        
                                    
                                
                              
                            
                          
                          

                            

                              
                                Top 10 zone Snake () ‚óè
                              
                            
                            

                              

                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                            
                                        
                                        
                                            
                                        
                                        
                                        
.  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                                        

                                        
Latin points: 
                                        

                                        
                                          
                                            

                                              Chess
                                              Snake
                                              Sudoku

.  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC

template.name: Winners View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    LatinChain Winners Board
                
                
                    

                        Current time:  UTC


                        
                            Cut at:  UTC


                        
                        
                            
                                
 
your streaming
                                

                            
                            Your points:  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                            

                            
Latin points: 
                            

                            
                              
                                

                                  Chess
                                  Snake
                                  Sudoku
                                
                              
                              
                                

                                  
                                  
                                  
                                
                              
                            
                            
                                
                                    
 You are winner, check in this winner list. 

                                
                            
                            
                                
                                     You have been paid
                                    
                                    
                                        at  UTC,
                                     check in your Pi wallet.
                                
                            


                        
                        
                            Total users in the app: 

                        
                        
                            Total verified users in the app: 


                        
                        
                        
                            $(document).ready(function($) {
                                $(".open_streaming").click(function(){
                                    var streaming_url = validateYouTubeUrl($(this).attr("videourl"));
                                    streaming_url = streaming_url[1];
                                    $.colorbox({width: "80%", height: "80%", maxWidth: "80%", maxHeight: "80%", html:''});
                                });
                            
                                $(".on-page-search").on("input.highlight", function() {
                                    var searchTerm = $(this).val();
                                    $(".accordion-body").unmark().mark(searchTerm);
                                    if(searchTerm.trim() != "")
                                    {
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).hide();
                                        if($( ".accordion-body" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                           $(".list-group-item").each(function(index) {
                                                if($(this).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                {
                                                    $(this).show();
                                                }
                                            });
                                            
                                           $( "#text_found" ).show();
                                           $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                           if($( ".username_code" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                $( "#user_found" ).show();
                                           else
                                                $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                           
                                           $( "#headingOne" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }else
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                            $( "#text_notfound" ).show();
                                            $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }
                                    }else
                                    {
                                        $('.list-group-item').show();
                                        
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).show();
                                        $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                        $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                        $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                        
                                        $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                    }
                                }).trigger("input.highlight").focus();
                                
                                $("#user_question").click(function() {
                                    $(".on-page-search").focus();
                                });
                                
                                $( ".clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                    var result = confirm($("#clear_cache_message").text());
                                    if(result)
                                    {
                                        try {
                                            Cache.delete();
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                        try {
                                            window.location.reload(true);
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                            });
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.
                        
                        


                        
                        

                            

                            

                                 
                            
                            

                                
                                
                            
                            

                        
                        

                        
                        

                          

                            

                              
                                Winners zone () ‚óè
                              
                            
                            

                              

                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                        
                                        
                                        

                                        
                                            
 
watch streaming
                                            

                                        
                                        .   (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC

                                              Chess
                                              Snake
                                              Sudoku

template.name: Winners View
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    LatinChain Top 50 streamers
                
                
                    

                        Current time:  UTC


                        
                            
                                
 
your streaming
                                

                            
                            Your points:  (,  UTC) has  points at  UTC 
                            

                            
Latin points: 
                            

                            
                              
                                

                                  Chess
                                  Snake
                                  Sudoku
                                
                              
                              
                                

                                  
                                  
                                  
                                
                              
                            


                        
                        
                            Total users in the app: 

                        
                        
                            Total verified users in the app: 


                        
                        
                        
                            $(document).ready(function($) {
                                $(".open_streaming").click(function(){
                                    var streaming_url = validateYouTubeUrl($(this).attr("videourl"));
                                    streaming_url = streaming_url[1];
                                    $.colorbox({width: "80%", height: "80%", maxWidth: "80%", maxHeight: "80%", html:''});
                                });
                            
                                $(".on-page-search").on("input.highlight", function() {
                                    var searchTerm = $(this).val();
                                    $(".accordion-body").unmark().mark(searchTerm);
                                    if(searchTerm.trim() != "")
                                    {
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).hide();
                                        if($( ".accordion-body" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                           $(".list-group-item").each(function(index) {
                                                if($(this).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                {
                                                    $(this).show();
                                                }
                                            });
                                            
                                           $( "#text_found" ).show();
                                           $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                           if($( ".username_code" ).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
                                                $( "#user_found" ).show();
                                           else
                                                $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                           
                                           $( "#headingOne" ).addClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }else
                                        {
                                            $('.list-group-item').hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                            $( "#text_notfound" ).show();
                                            $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                            
                                            $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                        }
                                    }else
                                    {
                                        $('.list-group-item').show();
                                        
                                        //$( "#user_question" ).show();
                                        $( "#text_found" ).hide();
                                        $( "#text_notfound" ).hide();
                                        $( "#user_found" ).hide();
                                        
                                        $( "#headingOne" ).removeClass("text-decoration-underline");
                                    }
                                }).trigger("input.highlight").focus();
                                
                                $("#user_question").click(function() {
                                    $(".on-page-search").focus();
                                });
                                
                                $( ".clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                    var result = confirm($("#clear_cache_message").text());
                                    if(result)
                                    {
                                        try {
                                            Cache.delete();
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                        try {
                                            window.location.reload(true);
                                        } catch (err) {
                                            console.error(err);
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                            });
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.
                        
                        


                        
                        

                            

                            

                                 
                            
                            

                                
                                
                            
                            

                        
                        

                        
                        

                          

                            

                              
                                Top 50 streamers () ‚óè
                              
                            
                            

                              

                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                        
                                        
                                        

                                        
                                            
 
watch streaming

template.name: Credits
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                        $(document).ready( function () {
                            $('#donators').DataTable( {
                                responsive: true,
                                ajax: '/get-credits-data',
                                processing: true,
                                serverSide: true,
                                serverMethod: 'post',
                                columns: [
                                    { data: 'pi_user_code' },
                                ],
                                ordering: false,
                            } );
                        } );
                    
                    
                    Credits
                
                
                    

                        Current time:  UTC


                        
                        LatinChain give its thanks to all the donators who donate Pi:

                        

                          

                            

                              
                                Donators
                              
                            
                            

                              

                                
                                


                                
                                    
                                        

                                            Username

template.name: Transactions
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                        function copyToClipboard(text) {
                            var sampleTextarea = document.createElement("textarea");
                            document.body.appendChild(sampleTextarea);
                            sampleTextarea.value = text; //save main text in it
                            sampleTextarea.select(); //select textarea contenrs
                            document.execCommand("copy");
                            document.body.removeChild(sampleTextarea);
                        }
                        $(document).ready( function () {
                            window.addEventListener('unhandledrejection', function (e) {
                                e.preventDefault();
                                e.stopPropagation();
                                e.stopImmediatePropagation();
                                return false;
                            });
                            
                            //(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
                            
                            var pi_user_id = "", pi_user_code = "", accessToken = "";
                            
                            var passkey = "";
                            var unblocked = false;
                            var show_pi_ad_user = true;
                        
                            var myData ={};
                            
                            myData.pi_user_code = pi_user_code;
                            myData.pi_user_id = pi_user_id;
                            myData.accessToken = accessToken;
                            
                            var table = $('#transactions').DataTable( {
                                responsive: true,
                                //ajax: '/get-transactions-data',
                                ajax: {
                                    'type': 'POST',
                                    'url': '/get-transactions-data/latinchain',
                                    'data': function ( d ) {
                                       return  $.extend(d, myData);
                                    }
                                },
                                processing: true,
                                serverSide: true,
                                serverMethod: 'post',
                                columns: [
                                    { data: 'memo', width: '40%' },
                                    { data: 'amount', width: '30%' },
                                    { data: 'txid', width: '30%' },
                                ],
                                ordering: false,
                                scrollCollapse: true,
                                scrollX: false,
                                autoWidth: false
                            } );
                            const Pi = window.Pi;
                            
                            Pi.init({ version: "2.0", sandbox: $("#sandbox").val() });
                            
                            function set_points(points) {
                                if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                                {
                                    var data = {
                                        'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                        'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                        'points': points,
                                        'passkey': passkey,
                                        'accessToken': accessToken,
                                        'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                    };
                                    //$.ajaxSetup({async: false});
                                    return $.post( "/pi-points", data).done(function(data) {
                                        data = JSON.parse(data);
                                        //if(data.result)
                                        //    alert("You won " + points + " points");
                                        //$("#refresh").click();

                                    }).fail(function() {
                                    });
                                }
                            }
                            
                            function get_user() {
                                if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                                {
                                    var data = {
                                                'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                                'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                                'accessToken': accessToken,
                                                'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                            };
                                    //$.ajaxSetup({async: false});
                                    return $.post( "/get-user", data).done(function(data) {
                                        data = JSON.parse(data);
                                        if(data.result)
                                        {
                                            if(data.complete_found)
                                                alert($("#payment_message").text());
                                                
                                            show_pi_ad_user = data.show_pi_ad;
                                            
                                            passkey=data.passkey;
                                            if(data.unblocked)
                                            {
                                                unblocked = data.unblocked;
                                            }
                                        }
                                        
                                    }).fail(function() {
                                    });
                                }
                            }
                            
                            async function showPiAds(Pi) {
                                try {
                                    const isAdReadyResponse = await Pi.Ads.isAdReady("interstitial");
                                
                                    if (isAdReadyResponse.ready === false) {
                                        await Pi.Ads.requestAd("interstitial");
                                    }
                                    
                                    const showAdResponse = await Pi.Ads.showAd("interstitial");
                                    
                                    if(showAdResponse.result == "AD_CLOSED")
                                    {
                                        if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                                        {
                                            var data = {
                                                        'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                                        'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                                        'accessToken': accessToken,
                                                        'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                                    };
                                            //$.ajaxSetup({async: false});
                                            return $.post( "/set-pi-ad-datetime", data).done(function(data) {
                                                data = JSON.parse(data);
                                                if(data.result)
                                                {
                                                }
                                            }).fail(function() {
                                                
                                            });
                                        }
                                    }
                                } catch (err) {
                                    //alert(err);
                                    // Not able to fetch the user
                                }
                            }
                            
                            async function auth() {
                                try {
                                    const nativeFeaturesList = await Pi.nativeFeaturesList();
                                    const adNetworkSupported = nativeFeaturesList.includes("ad_network");
                                    
                                    if(!adNetworkSupported)
                                        alert("Update Pi Browser version, please!.");
                                    
                                    // Identify the user with their username / unique network-wide ID, and  qget permission to request payments from them.
                                    const scopes = ['username', 'payments', 'wallet_address'];
                                    function onIncompletePaymentFound(payment) {
                                        
                                    }; // Read more about this in the SDK reference

                                    Pi.authenticate(scopes, onIncompletePaymentFound).then(function(auth) {
                                        pi_user_id = auth.user.uid;
                                        pi_user_code = auth.user.username;
                                        accessToken = auth.accessToken;
                                        
                                        $('#username').html(" " + auth.user.username);
                                        
                                        myData.pi_user_code = pi_user_code;
                                        myData.pi_user_id = pi_user_id;
                                        myData.accessToken = accessToken;
                                        table.ajax.reload();
                                        
                                        set_points(0).always(function(){
                                            get_user().always(function(){
                                                if(show_pi_ad_user)
                                                    showPiAds(Pi);
                                            });
                                        });
                                    }).catch(function(error) {
                                        console.error(error);
                                    });
                                } catch (err) {
                                    console.error(err);
                                }
                            }
                        
                            auth();
                            
                            $( "#clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                var result = confirm($( "#clear_cache_message" ).text());
                                if(result)
                                {
                                    try {
                                        Cache.delete();
                                    } catch (err) {
                                        console.error(err);
                                    }
                                    try {
                                        window.location.reload(true);
                                    } catch (err) {
                                        console.error(err);
                                    }
                                }
                            });
                            
                            $( "#back" ).click(function() {
                                var result = confirm($( "#back_message" ).text());
                                if(result)
                                {
                                    //history.back();
                                    location.href="/";
                                }
                            });
                        } );
                    
                    
                    Transactions
                
                
                    
                    
Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.
                    
Are you sure you want to go back?.
                    
                    

                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        

                        
                        
                        


                        Current time:  UTC


                        Pi cryptocurrency Transactions for user :


                        
                            
                                

                                    Memo
                                    Amount
                                    TXID

template.name: LatinChain Academy
template.t:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            
                

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                        function copyToClipboard(text) {
                            var sampleTextarea = document.createElement("textarea");
                            document.body.appendChild(sampleTextarea);
                            sampleTextarea.value = text; //save main text in it
                            sampleTextarea.select(); //select textarea contenrs
                            document.execCommand("copy");
                            document.body.removeChild(sampleTextarea);
                        }
                        $(document).ready( function () {
                            window.addEventListener('unhandledrejection', function (e) {
                                e.preventDefault();
                                e.stopPropagation();
                                e.stopImmediatePropagation();
                                return false;
                            });
                            
                            //(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
                            
                            var pi_user_id = "", pi_user_code = "", accessToken = "";
                            
                            var passkey = "";
                            var unblocked = false;
                            var show_pi_ad_user = true;
                            
                            const Pi = window.Pi;
                            
                            Pi.init({ version: "2.0", sandbox: $("#sandbox").val() });
                            
                            function set_points(points) {
                                if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                                {
                                    var data = {
                                        'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                        'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                        'points': points,
                                        'passkey': passkey,
                                        'accessToken': accessToken,
                                        'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                    };
                                    //$.ajaxSetup({async: false});
                                    return $.post( "/pi-points", data).done(function(data) {
                                        data = JSON.parse(data);
                                        //if(data.result)
                                        //    alert("You won " + points + " points");
                                        //$("#refresh").click();

                                    }).fail(function() {
                                    });
                                }
                            }
                            
                            function get_user() {
                                if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                                {
                                    var data = {
                                                'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                                'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                                'accessToken': accessToken,
                                                'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                            };
                                    //$.ajaxSetup({async: false});
                                    return $.post( "/get-user", data).done(function(data) {
                                        data = JSON.parse(data);
                                        if(data.result)
                                        {
                                            if(data.complete_found)
                                                alert($("#payment_message").text());
                                                
                                            show_pi_ad_user = data.show_pi_ad;
                                            
                                            passkey=data.passkey;
                                            
                                            $("#show_pibrowser").hide();
                                            if(data.unblocked)
                                            {
                                                unblocked = data.unblocked;
                                                
                                                startLatinChainAcademy("#show_content");
                                                $("#show_content").show();
                                            }else
                                            {
                                                $("#show_button").show();
                                            }
                                        }
                                        
                                    }).fail(function() {
                                    });
                                }
                            }
                            
                            async function showPiAds(Pi) {
                                try {
                                    const isAdReadyResponse = await Pi.Ads.isAdReady("interstitial");
                                
                                    alert(isAdReadyResponse.ready);
                                    if (isAdReadyResponse.ready === false) {
                                        await Pi.Ads.requestAd("interstitial");
                                    }
                                    
                                    const showAdResponse = await Pi.Ads.showAd("interstitial");
                                    
                                    if(showAdResponse.result == "AD_CLOSED")
                                    {
                                        if(pi_user_id != "" && pi_user_code != "")
                                        {
                                            var data = {
                                                        'pi_user_id': pi_user_id,
                                                        'pi_user_code': pi_user_code,
                                                        'accessToken': accessToken,
                                                        'csrf_token': odoo.csrf_token,
                                                    };
                                            //$.ajaxSetup({async: false});
                                            return $.post( "/set-pi-ad-datetime", data).done(function(data) {
                                                data = JSON.parse(data);
                                                if(data.result)
                                                {
                                                }
                                            }).fail(function() {
                                                
                                            });
                                        }
                                    }
                                } catch (err) {
                                    //alert(err);
                                    // Not able to fetch the user
                                }
                            }
                            
                            async function auth() {
                                try {
                                    const nativeFeaturesList = await Pi.nativeFeaturesList();
                                    const adNetworkSupported = nativeFeaturesList.includes("ad_network");
                                    
                                    if(!adNetworkSupported)
                                        alert("Update Pi Browser version, please!.");
                                    
                                    // Identify the user with their username / unique network-wide ID, and  qget permission to request payments from them.
                                    const scopes = ['username', 'payments', 'wallet_address'];
                                    function onIncompletePaymentFound(payment) {
                                        
                                    }; // Read more about this in the SDK reference

                                    Pi.authenticate(scopes, onIncompletePaymentFound).then(function(auth) {
                                        pi_user_id = auth.user.uid;
                                        pi_user_code = auth.user.username;
                                        accessToken = auth.accessToken;
                                        
                                        $('#username').html(" " + auth.user.username);
                                        
                                        set_points(0).always(function(){
                                            get_user().always(function(){
                                                if(show_pi_ad_user && ["Mainnet ON", "Mainnet OFF"].includes($("#mainnet").val()))
                                                    showPiAds(Pi);
                                            });
                                        });
                                    }).catch(function(error) {
                                        console.error(error);
                                    });
                                } catch (err) {
                                    console.error(err);
                                }
                            }
                        
                            auth();
                            
                            setTimeout(function ()
                            {
                                if(pi_user_code == "" && pi_user_code == "")
                                    $("#show_pibrowser").show();
                            }, 5000);
                            
                            $( "#clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                var result = confirm($( "#clear_cache_message" ).text());
                                if(result)
                                {
                                    try {
                                        Cache.delete();
                                    } catch (err) {
                                        console.error(err);
                                    }
                                    try {
                                        window.location.reload(true);
                                    } catch (err) {
                                        console.error(err);
                                    }
                                }
                            });
                            
                            $( "#back" ).click(function() {
                                var result = confirm($( "#back_message" ).text());
                                if(result)
                                {
                                    //history.back();
                                    location.href="/";
                                }
                            });
                            
                            $(".open_streaming").click(function(){
                                var streaming_url = $(this).attr("videourl");
                                $.colorbox({width: "80%", height: "80%", maxWidth: "80%", maxHeight: "80%", html:''});
                            });
                        } );
                    
                    
                    LatinChain Academy
                
                
                    
                    
Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.
                    
Are you sure you want to go back?.
